name: Arcane Lock
description: You touch a closed door, window, gate, chest, or other entryway and inscribe it with a magical lock. Until dispelled or suppressed, the DC to open the object increases by 10. You can set a password that suppresses the effect for 1 minute when spoken within 5 feet, or you can specify creatures that can open the object as normal.

components.materialDescription: gold dust worth at least 25 gp, sprinkled over the target

effects.description: Magically locks the target object; increases the DC to open by 10. You may set a password that suppresses the lock for 1 minute when spoken within 5 feet, or designate creatures who can open it normally.
